bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: When installing quassel-core on a new updated install of fedora 25 armv7hl on raspberrypi 2b
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): Linux raspberrypi 4.9.9-200.fc25.armv7hl #1 SMP Thu Feb 9 19:47:10 UTC 2017 armv7l armv7l armv7l GNU/Linux quassel-core-0.12.4-2.fc25.armv7hl firewalld-0.4.4.3-1.fc25.noarch
How reproducible: installer after installing, run "dnf update"
Steps to Reproduce: 1. install fedora 25 minimal (Fedora-Minimal-armhfp-25-1.3-sda.raw.xz) on raspberrypi microSD card using fedora-arm-installer from https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Raspberry_Pi 2. Boot rapsberrypi with microSD card 3. run "dnf update -y" as root 4. reboot 5. run "dnf install quassel-core"
Actual results:
Running transaction test The downloaded packages were saved in cache until the next successful transaction. You can remove cached packages by executing 'dnf clean packages'. Error: Transaction check error: file /usr/lib/firewalld/services/quassel.xml from install of quassel-core-0.12.4-2.fc25.armv7hl conflicts with file from package firewalld-0.4.4.3-1.fc25.noarch
Expected results: quassel-core is installed successfully.
Additional info:
quassel-0.12.4-4.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-b4aabe57c3
The service file has been added by upstream firewalld, but we got no information on that. The update mentioned above should fix it.
quassel-0.12.4-3.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-1d9c4c6feb

quassel-0.12.4-3.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-1d9c4c6feb

quassel-0.12.4-4.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-b4aabe57c3
quassel-0.12.4-4.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
quassel-0.12.4-3.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
